title: 'Black Hair Reimagined' Turned Hair Into High Art â€” and Honored Its Legacy
description: My first introduction to the concept of a hair show was growing up, when I saw ads for Hair Wars in the salon chair. My second introduction was during Cycle 7 of "America's Next Top Model," in an episode where the models donned big, colorful wigs for a photoshoot. That was the first time I thought ...Continue reading
author: Amanda Mitchell
